body:
## Themoji

### Background

> We were in Thailand in a local restaurant, they couldn't speak English, so we pointed at the English/Thai title on the menu. We got our food without rice, but didn't have anything to point to - we thought about how we can communicate that.

> This is when it hit us: We didn't have an internet connection to just google for rice. But what do we all have locally? Emojis :arrow_right: :rice:

### Implementation

Themoji is a super simple application, you search for an emoji and it will be displayed full-screen on your iPhone. You can then show this to your waitress, bartender or other locals.

### Example uses

#### Communicating while traveling

- Order another beer: :beer: (or any other food and drink)
- Ask for the way to 
  - Train Station :steam_locomotive:
  - Airport :airplane:
  - Hospital :hospital:
  - Attractions in the city :ferris_wheel: 
- Ask for :scissors: or a :pencil2: 
- Get some batteries :battery: 

#### Fun stuff for the young kids

Your iPhone becomes an emoji basically. You can take pictures with you and any emoji next to you: 
- on the beach with :sunglasses:
- sleepy on the airplane :sleeping:
- eating burgers :hamburger: 

Have any more ideas? Please let me know! 

Also, we're open for Series C investments, please reach out to sendmecash@krausefx.com
